summary: Custom CBBE or Base UNP Breton standalone follower
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][size=6][color=#dbb0a7]Tulay[/color]
[/size]
[color=#fce5cd][i]"Veil of the Moon"[/i]
[/color]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/vx6jscxdz/20160918004119_1.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Tulay
Race:  Breton
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  .94
Weight:  50
Skin:  4K Demonic
Body:  Custom CBBE or Base UNP
[i]*CBBE shown in screenshots*[/i]
Location:  Markarth - Silver Blood Inn
Armor:  Dwarven Bikini Armor 
Weapon:  Fudou Myouou Katana & Dwemer Bow

*No Armor .esp now available.  Warning:  She will be naked*

ENB:  RealVision & Vividian
Tested with AFT & EFF

Class:  Combat Assassin
Style:  Boss One-Handed

Levels with player.  Breton traits/bonuses.  Skill bonuses and perks:  One-Hand, Archery, Sneak, and Heavy Armor.  

[i]*Jewelry shown in some screenshots is not included in follower files*[/i]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/4nv6duwav/20160914083501_1.jpg[/img]

[youtube]ot6YTWQbt0I[/youtube]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
With certain ENBs there may be a slightly noticeable line between the gloss of the body and the non gloss of the face
(Example:  During testing it was noticed on Vividian but not seen on RealVision.)

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
Manual or your favorite mod manager.

[img]http://s5.postimg.cc/cuuirf5dz/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]

[/font][font=Verdana][img]http://s5.postimg.cc/gfqean9xj/permissions.png[/img][/font][font=Verdana]
